original_title: A Day With Kagney Linn Karter
overview: The blonde bombshell, Kagney Linn Karter, is here and ready to be your dream girlfriend for a day. Lose yourself in her sparkling blue eyes, pearly white smile and smooth skin in the morning... A naughty wake up call is just the beginning of this wonderful day. How about a pole dance session after breakfast? Or jump in the tub together and watch Kagney's ass bounce off your sex? Are you ready? Then discover her lesbian fantasies and surprise Kagney with a threesome with another hot blonde. Are you man enough to satisfy such a hot duo?
title: A Day With Kagney Linn Karter
